title: THOSE WHO MASSACRED EVEN MAHA SANGHA ARE MINISTERS TODAY, SAYS VEN. SOBHITHA
content: October 06, 2010: Those who bombed the Sri Dalada Maligawa, attacked Sri Maha Bodhi and shed blood killing scores of devotees, massacred over 500 unarmed policemen and hacked to death 35 Buddhist monks at Arantalawa in the most inhuman manner, are government ministers today, said the Venerable Maduluwawe Sobhiha Thera, Chief Incumbent of the Sri…
